original_title: El convoy o (no soy una metrera)
overview: Joaquin (David Daniel) decides to end his relationship with his boyfriend and leave without thinking. On the way, after boarding the last Metro car in Mexico City he will meet Alejandro (Lucio Rodríguez), a boy willing to change course. An allegory on the sexual encounters between men in the Metro, considered by the author as the veins of the CDMX.
title: El convoy o (no soy una metrera)
